verbose_text: Since we observed that the ATM protein was expressed in endosomes and it is known that class III PI3Ks are responsible for the production of PtdIns (3) P in the membranes of endosomes, and mediate vesicular transport, membrane trafficking and intracellular protein sorting, our study focused on the effects of ATM on the activity of class III PI3Ks.
evidence: class III PI3Ks are responsible for the production of PtdIns(3)P in the membranes of endosomes, and mediate vesicular transport
